page.title: 07INDUSTRY
page.content: Belper,one of the oldest industrial towns in the Midlands was made famous by its nail makers and{Arkwright and {Strutt cotton mills. {English Sewing Cotton}operates the famous mills at Belper and Milford which produce thread for world markets.Gloworm's gas_fired central heating boilers and fires are exported into Europe as are{Parkrays}solid fuel appliances. {Thorntons}are a major producer of confectionary. {Silkolene oil}refinery products are used by major airlines,road vehicles manufacturing industries and farmers. {Deb Chemicals}export their cleansing products and liquid soap world wide. {Corrugated Products}supply{Cadburys, {Pallitoy}and others with cardboard boxes.Other well known hosiery and textile firms are in Belper.
